uk.org.lidalia.test

Class Assert

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.org.lidalia.test.Assert

  • public final class Assert
extends Object
    Utility Hamcrest matchers for unit test assertions.

    • Method Detail

      • isNotInstantiable

        public static org.hamcrest.Matcher<Class<?>> isNotInstantiable()
        Asserts that a class is not instantiable - it exists only for its static members.

        More precisely, asserts that the class:

        • Has Object as its immediate superclass
        • Has only one constructor
        • That constructor is private
        • That constructor takes no arguments
        • That constructor will throw an UnsupportedOperationException with message "Not Instantiable" if it is invoked via reflection.

        Usage: assertThat(Values.class, isNotInstantiable());

        Returns:
        a matcher that asserts that a class is not instantiable

      • aClassWhoseSuperClass

        public static <U,T extends U> uk.org.lidalia.test.FeatureMatcher<Class<? extends T>,Class<? extends U>> aClassWhoseSuperClass(org.hamcrest.Matcher<? extends Class<? extends U>> classMatcher)
        Facilitates making an assertion about the superclass of a Class.

        Usage: assertThat(String.class, is(aClassWhoseSuperClass(is(Object.class))));

        Type Parameters:
        U - the type of the superclass of the class being matched
        T - the type of the class being matched
        Parameters:
        classMatcher - the matcher that will be applied to the class's superclass
        Returns:
        a matcher that will assert something about the superclass of a class

      • aCollectionWhoseSize

        public static <T extends Collection<?>> org.hamcrest.Matcher<T> aCollectionWhoseSize(org.hamcrest.Matcher<Integer> sizeMatcher)
        Facilitates making an assertion about the size of a Collection.

        Usage: assertThat(asList(1, 2, 3), is(aCollectionWhoseSize(is(3))));

        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the collection whose size will be matched
        Parameters:
        sizeMatcher - the matcher that will be applied to the collection's size
        Returns:
        a matcher that will assert something about a collection's size

      • aListWhoseElementAtIndex

        public static <T extends List<? extends E>,E> org.hamcrest.Matcher<T> aListWhoseElementAtIndex(Integer index,
                                                                               org.hamcrest.Matcher<E> matcher)
        Facilitates making an assertion about the element at a given index of a List.

        Usage: assertThat(asList("a", "b", "c"), is(aListWhoseElementAtIndex(2, is("c"))));

        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the List
        E - the type of the elements in the List
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the element in the list the matcher will be applied to
        matcher - the matcher that will be applied to the element
        Returns:
        a matcher that will assert something about the element at the given index of a collection

      • isAMemberWithModifier

        public static <T extends Member> org.hamcrest.Matcher<T> isAMemberWithModifier(uk.org.lidalia.lang.Modifier modifier)
        Asserts that a given Member has a given Modifier.

        Usage: assertThat(Object.class.getMethod("toString"), isAMemberWithModifier(Modifier.PUBLIC));

        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the Member
        Parameters:
        modifier - the modifier the member is expected to have
        Returns:
        a matcher that will assert a member has a modifier
